00079             function                __construct()
00080             {

00082                   {

00084                         $this->CachedMultyFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00085                         $this->PageMarkup = get_package( 'page::page_markup' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00086                         $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00087                         $this->Trace = get_package( 'trace' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

00121             function                get_function_name( $PackageObject , $RequestionFunction )
00122             {
00123                   try
00124                   {
00125                         if( $RequestionFunction == 'post_process' || $RequestionFunction == 'pre_process' )
00126                         {
00127                               if( method_exists( $PackageObject , $RequestionFunction ) )
00128                               {
00129                                     return( $RequestionFunction );
00130                               }
00131                         }
00132                         
00133                         if( method_exists( $PackageObject , 'process_string' ) )
00134                         {
00135                               return( 'process_string' );
00136                         }
00137                         
00138                         return( false );
00139                   }
00140                   catch( Exception $e )
00141                   {
00142                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00143                   }
00144             }

00168             function                throw_method_was_not_found_exception( $p , $FunctionName )
00169             {
00170                   $ClassName = $p[ 'fetched_package' ] !== false ? get_class( $p[ 'fetched_package' ] ) : 'false';
00171                         
00172                   $PackageFullName = $p[ 'package' ].'.'.$p[ 'package_version' ];
00173                   
00174                   throw( 
00175                         new Exception( 
00176                               'Function "'.$FunctionName.'" was not found in class "'.$ClassName.
00177                                     '" from package '.$PackageFullName
00178                         )
00179                   );
00180             }

00204             function                join_stylesheets( $Files )
00205             {
00206                   try
00207                   {
00208                         if( is_array( $Files ) && count( $Files ) > 0 )
00209                         {
00210                               $RetFiles = array();
00211                               
00212                               $Compressed = array();
00213                               
00216                               foreach( $Files as $k => $v )
00217                               {
00218                                     if( strpos( $v[ 'path' ] , '{http_host}/' ) === 0 )
00219                                     {
00220                                           $v[ 'path' ] = str_replace( '{http_host}/' , './' , $v[ 'path' ] );
00221                                     }
00222                                     $v[ 'path' ] = $this->String->compile_ultimix_tags( $v[ 'path' ] );
00223                                           
00224                                     if( $v[ 'join' ] )
00225                                     {
00226                                           $Compressed[ 'join' ] [] = $v[ 'path' ];
00227                                     }
00228                                     else
00229                                     {
00230                                           $Key = dirname( $v[ 'path' ] );
00231                                           $Key = str_replace( '././' , './' , $Key );
00232                                           
00233                                           if( isset( $Compressed[ $Key ] ) == false )
00234                                           {
00235                                                 $Compressed[ $Key ] = array();
00236                                           }
00237                                           
00238                                           $Compressed[ $Key ] [] = basename( $v[ 'path' ] );
00239                                     }
00240                               }
00241                               
00244                               foreach( $Compressed as $k1 => $v1 )
00245                               {
00246                                     if( $k1 === 'join' )
00247                                     {
00252                                           $FilesHash = '';
00253                                           foreach( $v1 as $k2 => $v2 )
00254                                           {
00255                                                 $FilesHash .= $v2;
00256                                           }
00257                                           
00258                                           $FilesHash = md5( $FilesHash );
00259                                           $UnionFilePath = dirname( __FILE__ )."/tmp/$FilesHash.css";
00260                                           
00261                                           if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $UnionFilePath ) === false || 
00262                                                 $this->Cache->get_data( $UnionFilePath ) === false )
00263                                           {
00264                                                 $Handle = fopen( dirname( __FILE__ )."/tmp/$FilesHash.css" , "wb" );
00265                                           
00266                                                 foreach( $v1 as $k2 => $v2 )
00267                                                 {
00268                                                       $Content = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( "$v2" );
00269                                                       fwrite( $Handle , $Content );
00270                                                       fwrite( $Handle , "\r\n" );
00271                                                 }
00272                                                 
00273                                                 fclose( $Handle );
00274                                                 
00275                                                 $RetFiles [] = array( 
00276                                                       'path' => _get_package_relative_path( __FILE__ )."/tmp/$FilesHash.css"
00277                                                 );
00278                                           }
00279                                           else
00280                                           {
00281                                                 $RetFiles [] = array( 
00282                                                       'path' => _get_package_relative_path( __FILE__ )."/tmp/$FilesHash.css"
00283                                                 );
00284                                           }
00285                                     }
00286                                     elseif( count( $v1 ) == 1 )
00287                                     {
00290                                           $RetFiles [] = array( 'path' => str_replace( './' , '{http_host}/' , "$k1/".$v1[ 0 ] ) );
00291                                     }
00292                                     else
00293                                     {
00296                                           $FilesHash = '';
00297                                           foreach( $v1 as $k2 => $v2 )
00298                                           {
00299                                                 $FilesHash .= $v2;
00300                                           }
00301                                           $FilesHash = md5( $FilesHash );
00302                                     
00303                                           $UnionFilePath = "$k1/$FilesHash.css";
00304                                     
00305                                           if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $UnionFilePath ) === false || 
00306                                                 $this->Cache->get_data( $UnionFilePath ) === false )
00307                                           {
00308                                                 $Handle = fopen( $UnionFilePath , "wb" );
00309                                           
00310                                                 foreach( $v1 as $k2 => $v2 )
00311                                                 {
00312                                                       $Content = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( "$k1/$v2" );
00313                                                       fwrite( $Handle , $Content );
00314                                                       fwrite( $Handle , "\r\n" );
00315                                                 }
00316                                                 
00317                                                 fclose( $Handle );
00318                                           }
00319 
00320                                           $RetFiles [] = array( 'path' => str_replace( './' , '{http_host}/' , $UnionFilePath ) );
00321                                     }
00322                               }
00323                               
00324                               return( $RetFiles );
00325                         }
00326                         else
00327                         {
00328                               return( $Files );
00329                         }
00330                   }
00331                   catch( Exception $e )
00332                   {
00333                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00334                   }
00335             }

00359             function                join_scripts( $Files )
00360             {
00361                   try
00362                   {
00363                         if( is_array( $Files ) && count( $Files ) > 0 )
00364                         {
00367                               $FilesHash = '';
00368                               foreach( $Files as $k => $v )
00369                               {
00370                                     if( $v[ 'join' ] )
00371                                     {
00372                                           $FilesHash .= $v[ 'path' ];
00373                                     }
00374                               }
00375                               $FilesHash = md5( $FilesHash );
00376                               
00377                               $UnionFilePath = dirname( __FILE__ )."/tmp/$FilesHash.js";
00378                               
00379                               $FilesRet = array();
00380                               
00381                               if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $UnionFilePath ) === false || 
00382                                     $this->Cache->get_data( $UnionFilePath ) === false )
00383                               {
00384                                     $Handle = fopen( $UnionFilePath , "wb" );
00385                                     
00386                                     foreach( $Files as $k => $v )
00387                                     {
00388                                           if( $v[ 'join' ] )
00389                                           {
00390                                                 if( strpos( $v[ 'path' ] , '{http_host}/' ) === 0 )
00391                                                 {
00392                                                       $v[ 'path' ] = str_replace( '{http_host}/' , './' , $v[ 'path' ] );
00393                                                 }
00394                                                 $v[ 'path' ] = $this->String->compile_ultimix_tags( $v[ 'path' ] );
00395                                                 
00396                                                 $Content = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $v[ 'path' ] );
00397                                                 fwrite( $Handle , $Content );
00398                                                 fwrite( $Handle , "\r\n" );
00399                                           }
00400                                           else
00401                                           {
00402                                                 $FilesRet [] = array( 'path' => $v[ 'path' ] );
00403                                           }
00404                                     }
00405                                     
00406                                     fclose( $Handle );
00407                                     
00408                                     $FilesRet [] = array( 
00409                                           'path' => str_replace( 
00410                                                 './' , '{http_host}/' , _get_package_relative_path( __FILE__ )."/tmp/$FilesHash.js"
00411                                           )
00412                                     );
00413                               }
00414                               else
00415                               {
00416                                     foreach( $Files as $k => $v )
00417                                     {
00418                                           if( !$v[ 'join' ] )
00419                                           {
00420                                                 $FilesRet [] = array( 'path' => $v[ 'path' ] );
00421                                           }
00422                                     }
00423                                     $FilesRet [] = array( 
00424                                           'path' => str_replace( 
00425                                                 './' , '{http_host}/' , _get_package_relative_path( __FILE__ )."/tmp/$FilesHash.js"
00426                                           )
00427                                     );
00428                               }
00429 
00430                               return( $FilesRet );
00431                         }
00432                         else
00433                         {
00434                               return( $Files );
00435                         }
00436                   }
00437                   catch( Exception $e )
00438                   {
00439                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00440                   }
00441             }

00465             function                output_stylesheets( $Str )
00466             {
00467                   try
00468                   {
00469                         if( is_array( $this->IncludedStylesheets ) && count( $this->IncludedStylesheets ) )
00470                         {
00471                               $this->IncludedStylesheets = $this->join_stylesheets( $this->IncludedStylesheets , 'css' );
00472                               $Start = '<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="';
00473                               $End = '"/>';
00474                               
00475                               $HeaderContent = $Start.implode_ex( $End.$Start , $this->IncludedStylesheets , 'path' ).$End;
00476                               
00477                               if( strpos( $Str , '{header}' ) !== false )
00478                               {
00479                                     $Str = str_replace( '{header}' , $HeaderContent.'{header}' , $Str );
00480                               }
00481                               else
00482                               {
00483                                     $Str = str_replace( '</header>' , $HeaderContent.'</header>' , $Str );
00484                               }
00485                         }
00486                         
00487                         $this->IncludedStylesheets = array();
00488                         
00489                         return( $Str );
00490                   }
00491                   catch( Exception $e )
00492                   {
00493                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00494                   }
00495             }

00519             function                output_scripts( $Str )
00520             {
00521                   try
00522                   {
00523                         if( is_array( $this->IncludedScripts ) && count( $this->IncludedScripts ) )
00524                         {
00525                               $this->IncludedScripts = $this->join_scripts( $this->IncludedScripts );
00526                               $Start = '<script src="';
00527                               $End = '"></script>';
00528                               
00529                               $HeaderContent = $Start.implode_ex( $End.$Start , $this->IncludedScripts , 'path' ).$End;
00530                               
00531                               if( strpos( $Str , '{header}' ) !== false )
00532                               {
00533                                     $Str = str_replace( '{header}' , $HeaderContent.'{header}' , $Str );
00534                               }
00535                               else
00536                               {
00537                                     $Str = str_replace( '</header>' , $HeaderContent.'</header>' , $Str );
00538                               }
00539                         }
00540                         
00541                         $this->IncludedScripts = array();
00542                         
00543                         return( $Str );
00544                   }

00546                   {
00547                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00573             function                add_javascript( $Path , $Join = true )
00574             {
00575                   try
00576                   {
00577                         if( $this->PageComposer === false )
00578                         {
00579                               $this->PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00580                         }
00581                         
00582                         $Path = $this->PageComposer->Template->process_string( $Path );
00583                         
00584                         foreach( $this->IncludedScripts as $k => $v )
00585                         {
00586                               if( $v[ 'path' ] == $Path )
00587                               {
00588                                     return;
00589                               }
00590                         }
00591                         
00592                         $this->IncludedScripts [] = array( 'path' => $Path , 'join' => $Join );
00593                   }
00594                   catch( Exception $e )
00595                   {
00596                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00597                   }
00598             }

00675             function                get_settings_for_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion )
00676             {
00677                   try
00678                   {
00679                         $PackageDirectory = _get_package_relative_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00680                         
00681                         if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( "$PackageDirectory/conf/cf_global_settings" ) )
00682                         {
00683                               return( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( "$PackageDirectory/conf/cf_global_settings" ) );
00684                         }
00685                         else
00686                         {
00687                               return( '' );
00688                         }
00689                   }
00690                   catch( Exception $e )
00691                   {
00692                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00693                   }
00694             }

00722             function                get_controller( $PackageName , $PackageVersion )
00723             {
00724                   try
00725                   {
00726                         $Package = get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , __FILE__ );
00727                         if( $Package === false )
00728                         {
00729                               $Package = get_package_object( 'page::auto_controller' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00730                               $Package->set_path( _get_package_relative_path_ex( 
00731                                     $PackageName , $PackageVersion ).'/unexisting_controller.php'
00732                               );
00733                         }
00734                         
00735                         return( $Package );
00736                   }
00737                   catch( Exception $e )
00738                   {
00739                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00740                   }
00741             }

00819             function                get_package_appliance( $Page , $PageName , $PageOptions )
00820             {
00821                   try
00822                   {
00823                         $Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00824                         $Settings->load_settings( $PageOptions );
00825                         $PredefinedPackages = array();
00826                         if( $Settings->get_setting( 'predefined_packages' , false ) )
00827                         {
00828                               $PredefinedPackagesRaw = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( 
00829                                     dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_predefined_packages' , 'exploded'
00830                               );
00831                               foreach( $PredefinedPackagesRaw as $Value )
00832                               {
00833                                     $Tmp = explode( '#' , $Value );
00834                                     $PredefinedPackages [] = array( 
00835                                           'package' => $Tmp[ 0 ] , 'package_version' => $Tmp[ 1 ] , 
00836                                           'options' => $Tmp[ 2 ] , 'placeholder' => $Tmp[ 3 ]
00837                                     );
00838                               }
00839                         }
00840                         
00841                         $PagePackages = $Page->get_package_appliance( $PageName );
00842                         
00843                         return( array_merge( $PredefinedPackages , $PagePackages ) );
00844                   }
00845                   catch( Exception $e )
00846                   {
00847                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00848                   }
00849             }

00873             function                load_settings_for_package( &$Package , &$Template )
00874             {
00875                   try
00876                   {
00877                         $PackageName = $Package[ 'package' ];
00878                         $PackageVersion = $Package[ 'package_version' ];
00879                         $PlaceHolder = $Package[ 'placeholder' ];
00880 
00881                         $Package[ 'settings' ] = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00882                         $PackageSettings = $this->get_settings_for_package( 
00883                               $PackageName , $PackageVersion
00884                         );
00885                         $Package[ 'settings' ]->load_settings( $PackageSettings );
00886                         $Package[ 'settings' ]->append_settings( $Package[ 'options' ] );
00887 
00888                         $PlaceHolderParameters = $Template->get_placeholder_parameters( $Package[ 'placeholder' ] );
00889                         
00890                         if( $PlaceHolderParameters !== false )
00891                         {
00892                               $Package[ 'settings' ]->append_settings( $PlaceHolderParameters );
00893                         }
00894                   }
00895                   catch( Exception $e )
00896                   {
00897                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00898                   }
00899             }
00900             
00923             function                fetch_packages( &$Packages , &$Template )
00924             {
00925                   try
00926                   {
00927                         foreach( $Packages as $i => $p )
00928                         {
00929                               $this->load_settings_for_package( $Packages[ $i ] , $Template );
00930                               
00931                               if( $Packages[ $i ][ 'settings' ]->get_setting( 'meta' , false ) !== false )
00932                               {
00933                                     $PackagePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( $p[ 'package' ] , $p[ 'package_version' ] );
00934                                     $MetaFileName = $Packages[ $i ][ 'settings' ]->get_setting( 'meta' );
00935                                     $MetaSettings = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( "$PackagePath/meta/$MetaFileName" );
00936                                     $Packages[ $i ][ 'settings' ]->append_settings( $MetaSettings );
00937                               }
00938                               if( $Packages[ $i ][ 'settings' ]->get_setting( 'controller' , false ) == '1' )
00939                               {
00940                                     $Packages[ $i ][ 'fetched_package' ] = $this->get_controller( 
00941                                           $p[ 'package' ] , $p[ 'package_version' ]
00942                                     );
00943                               }
00944                               elseif( $Packages[ $i ][ 'settings' ]->get_setting( 'view' , false ) == '1' )
00945                               {
00946                                     $Packages[ $i ][ 'fetched_package' ] = $this->get_view( 
00947                                           $p[ 'package' ] , $p[ 'package_version' ]
00948                                     );
00949                               }
00950                               else
00951                               {
00952                                     $Packages[ $i ][ 'fetched_package' ] = get_package(
00953                                           $p[ 'package' ] , $p[ 'package_version' ] , __FILE__
00954                                     );
00955                               }
00956                         }
00957                   }
00958                   catch( Exception $e )
00959                   {
00960                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00961                   }
00962             }
00963             
00998             function                call_processor_function( &$p , $String , &$Changed , $Type )
00999             {
01000                   try
01001                   {
01002                         $RealType = $this->get_function_name( $p[ 'fetched_package' ] , $Type );
01003                         
01004                         if( $RealType === false && $Type == 'process_string' )
01005                         {
01006                               /* nop */
01007                         }
01008                         elseif( $RealType === false  )
01009                         {
01010                               $this->throw_method_was_not_found_exception( $p , $Type );
01011                         }
01012                         else
01013                         {
01014                               $Caller = array( $p[ 'fetched_package' ] , $RealType );
01015                               $CallParameters = array( $p[ 'settings' ] , $String , &$Changed );
01016                               $String = call_user_func_array( $Caller , $CallParameters );
01017                         }
01018                         
01019                         return( $String );
01020                   }
01021                   catch( Exception $e )
01022                   {
01023                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01024                   }
01025             }
01026             
01053             function                execute_generators( &$Packages , $Type , &$Template )
01054             {
01055                   try
01056                   {
01057                         $this->Trace->start_group( $Type );
01058                         $Changed = false;
01059                         foreach( $Packages as $i => $p )
01060                         {
01061                               if( $p[ 'settings' ]->get_setting( $Type , false ) )
01062                               {
01063                                     if( method_exists( $p[ 'fetched_package' ] , $Type ) )
01064                                     {
01065                                           $Caller = array( $p[ 'fetched_package' ] , $Type );
01066                                           $Settings = $p[ 'settings' ];
01067                                           call_user_func( $Caller , $Settings );
01068                                     }
01069                                     else
01070                                     {
01071                                           $this->throw_method_was_not_found_exception( $p , $Type );
01072                                     }
01073                               }
01074                         }
01075                         $Template->add_stylesheets();
01076                         
01077                         $this->Trace->end_group();
01078                   }
01079                   catch( Exception $e )
01080                   {
01081                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01082                   }
01083             }
01084             
01115             function                execute_processors( &$Packages , $String , $Type )
01116             {
01117                   try
01118                   {
01119                         $this->Trace->start_group( "$Type" );
01120 
01121                         do
01122                         {
01123                               $Changed = false;
01124 
01125                               foreach( $Packages as $i => $p )
01126                               {
01127                                     if( $Type == 'process_string' || $p[ 'settings' ]->get_setting( $Type , false ) )
01128                                     {
01129                                           $String = $this->call_processor_function( $p , $String , $Changed , $Type );
01130                                     }
01131                               }
01132                         }
01133                         while( $Changed );
01134 
01135                         $this->Trace->end_group();
01136 
01137                         return( $String );
01138                   }
01139                   catch( Exception $e )
01140                   {
01141                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01142                   }
01143             }
01144 
01163             function                process_controllers( &$Packages )
01164             {
01165                   try
01166                   {
01167                         $this->Trace->start_group( "controllers" );
01168                         
01169                         foreach( $Packages as $i => $p )
01170                         {
01171                               if( $p[ 'settings' ]->get_setting( 'controller' , false ) )
01172                               {
01173                                     if( method_exists( $p[ 'fetched_package' ] , 'controller' ) )
01174                                     {
01175                                           $p[ 'fetched_package' ]->controller( $p[ 'settings' ] );
01176                                     }
01177                                     else
01178                                     {
01179                                           $this->throw_method_was_not_found_exception( $p , 'controller' );
01180                                     }
01181                               }
01182                         }
01183                         
01184                         $this->Trace->end_group();
01185                   }
01186                   catch( Exception $e )
01187                   {
01188                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01189                   }
01190             }

01214             function                process_views( &$Packages , &$Template )
01215             {
01216                   try
01217                   {
01218                         $this->Trace->start_group( "views" );
01219                         
01220                         foreach( $Packages as $i => $p )
01221                         {
01222                               if( $p[ 'placeholder' ] != '' )
01223                               {                                         
01224                                     if( $p[ 'settings' ]->get_setting( 'view' , false ) )
01225                                     {
01226                                           if( $p[ 'fetched_package' ] !== false && method_exists( $p[ 'fetched_package' ] , 'view' ) )
01227                                           {
01228                                                 $ControlView = $p[ 'fetched_package' ]->view( $p[ 'settings' ] );
01229                                                 
01230                                                 $ControlView = $this->PageMarkup->wrap_control_view( 
01231                                                       $p[ 'settings' ] , $ControlView
01232                                                 );
01233                                                 
01234                                                 $Template->parse( $p[ 'placeholder' ] , $ControlView );
01235                                           }
01236                                           else
01237                                           {
01238                                                 $this->throw_method_was_not_found_exception( $p , 'view' );
01239                                           }
01240                                     }
01241                               }
01242                         }
01243                         
01244                         $this->Trace->end_group();
01245                   }
01246                   catch( Exception $e )
01247                   {
01248                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01249                   }
01250             }
01251       }
